org.promasi.core
Class SdSystem

java.lang.Object
  org.promasi.core.SdSystem

public class SdSystem
extends java.lang.Object

The SdSystem contains one SdModel. An implementation of an IComputationalSequence and provides methods for handling the system.

Author:
eddiefullmetal

normalizeSdObjects

private void normalizeSdObjects(java.util.List<ISdObject> sdObjects)
Takes a list and checks if it contains any invalid sdObjects( sdObjects that their key matches the key of a system sdObject) and removes them. Adds all the needed SdObjectType.System objects :
  1. TimeSdObject

Parameters:
sdObjects - The ISdObjects to normalize.

getCurrentStep

public double getCurrentStep()
Gets the current step of the system using the TimeSdObject from the current SdModel.

Returns:
The current step.
